/*------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- 개체 이름 : HVCCD_MES.INF_PMS_MASTER_STATION
-- 만든 날짜 : 2013-06-04 오후 10:56:35
-- 마지막으로 수정한 날짜 : 2013-06-07 오후 4:22:55
-- 상태 : VALID
------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
DROP TABLE HVCCD_MES.INF_PMS_MASTER_STATION CASCADE CONSTRAINTS;

CREATE TABLE HVCCD_MES.INF_PMS_MASTER_STATION (
  ID                  VARCHAR2(64)     NOT NULL, 
  DOMAIN_ID           VARCHAR2(64)     NOT NULL, 
  ROUTING             VARCHAR2(5)          NULL, 
  EQUIPMENT           VARCHAR2(64)         NULL, 
  ST_NO               VARCHAR2(3)          NULL, 
  NAME                VARCHAR2(80)         NULL, 
  PROG_ID             VARCHAR2(30)         NULL, 
  ACTDTTM             VARCHAR2(17)         NULL, 
  DOWNLOAD_YN         VARCHAR2(1)          NULL, 
  TSFR_ALARM_LIMIT    NUMBER(5, 2)    DEFAULT 0         NULL
)
TABLESPACE HVCCD_MES_DAT
PCTFREE 10
PCTUSED 0
INITRANS 1
MAXTRANS 255
STORAGE (
    INITIAL 64 K
    NEXT 1024 K
    MINEXTENTS 1
    MAXEXTENTS UNLIMITED
)
LOGGING
NOCACHE
MONITORING
NOPARALLEL
;

/*------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- 개체 이름 : HVCCD_MES.IX_PMS_MST_STN_0
-- 만든 날짜 : 2013-06-04 오후 10:56:36
-- 마지막으로 수정한 날짜 : 2013-06-04 오후 10:56:36
-- 상태 : VALID
------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
DROP INDEX HVCCD_MES.IX_PMS_MST_STN_0;

CREATE UNIQUE INDEX HVCCD_MES.IX_PMS_MST_STN_0
ON HVCCD_MES.INF_PMS_MASTER_STATION (DOMAIN_ID, ROUTING, EQUIPMENT, ST_NO)
PCTFREE 10
INITRANS 2
MAXTRANS 255
STORAGE (
    INITIAL 64 K
    NEXT 1024 K
    MINEXTENTS 1
    MAXEXTENTS UNLIMITED
    PCTINCREASE 0
)
TABLESPACE HVCCD_MES_DAT
LOGGING
NOPARALLEL;

ALTER TABLE HVCCD_MES.INF_PMS_MASTER_STATION ADD
(
    PRIMARY KEY ( ID )
        USING INDEX
        TABLESPACE HVCCD_MES_DAT 
        PCTFREE 10
        INITRANS 2
        MAXTRANS 255
        STORAGE (
            INITIAL 64 K
            NEXT 1024 K
            MINEXTENTS 1
            MAXEXTENTS UNLIMITED
        )
);
